issue.title: [C++] Optimize parsing of Decimal128 in CSV
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5699](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5699). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Remove multiple string copies in Decimal.FromString()
- Add unsafe append method to Decimal128Builder

comments.body:
